title.rendered: Celebrate with Criniti’s 20th Anniversary: Dine, Scratch, and Win!

content.rendered:
Are you a lover of traditional Italian cuisine paired with contemporary dining experiences? If so, join us in celebrating Criniti’s 20th anniversary. We are marking this milestone with an enticing special promotion: “Dine, Scratch, and Win.” It’s a treat to your palate and a chance to win some amazing prizes.

As part of our 20th-anniversary celebration, for every $100 spent, you’ll receive a special scratch card. Each card holds the opportunity to win something special. Even more thrilling, hidden amongst these scratch cards are five golden tickets. If you’re fortunate enough to be one of these golden ticket holders, an exclusive party invite will come your way! At this party, you’ll spin the ‘Wheel of Wins’ for a chance to claim a once-in-a-lifetime prize – a trip to Italy (worth AUD 3500)!

Criniti’s journey began in 2003 in Parramatta, Sydney’s west. Here, the Criniti family first combined their passion for fine-quality food with a unique dining concept. The aspiration to share and celebrate their culinary heritage saw the restaurant quickly become a popular spot amongst locals.

The unique blend of traditional southern Italian and contemporary Australian cuisine captivated patrons’ taste buds and hearts. This authentic dining experience with a twist soon drew attention beyond the boundaries of Parramatta. Patrons started traveling from all corners of Sydney to taste what all the ‘fuss’ was about.

Our venues are open seven days a week for lunch and dinner, so we invite you to explore and ignite your senses with our varied and crowd-pleasing dishes. Our philosophy is simple yet deeply ingrained in everything we do: “Seek the best ingredients, produced by like-minded suppliers with consistency, sustainability, and most importantly, quality in mind.”

You can find us in various locations, including Brighton-Le-Sands, Parramatta, Castle-Hill, Wetherill-Park, Kotara, Carlton, Southbank, and Carousel.

At Criniti’s, we believe that the experience of sharing food with family and friends is sacred. It’s a bond that should be cherished and remembered. That’s why we say, when you’re here, you’re family… salute! Join us to celebrate our 20th anniversary, and who knows? You might be the next lucky winner dining your way to Italy.
